string.value: The number of ghosts have increased dramatically, that it got to the point of #p2041026# being sent to Ludibrium to do something about it. I should go see him.
I was able to meet #p2041026# past the Path of Time of Ludibrium. He wanted me to eliminate the bindings of #o7130300#, and collect the bindings for him. \n\n#t4000148# #b#c4000148#/20#k
I helped #p2041026#, who was hastily sent to Ludibrium, eliminate the bindings that enclosed #o7130300#.
Ahhhhh I'm a busy person trying to fix up a wounded soul. It's impossible to keep track of all these ghosts, that are ever increasing, so they were asking for help of the Ghosthunter.
And...huh? Did I ever mention this before? I've met my share of people, so I don't know... have we met before...?
Anyway, Master Death Teddy seems to be confined and controlled by this unknown, yet creepy force of evil. I heard it used to be a very adorable teddy bear.

I know, it's hard to imagine the cuter side of it just by looking at it now. How about eliminating the force that confines and controls it, and frees it up to its original state? What do you think of that? Do you want to do it?
If you bring the confining & controlling force of Master Death Teddys, I plan on studying it to see what really happened.
Please eliminate 20 Master Death Teddys and give me 20 of their confining forces. I'll be here looking out and see what's going on here. \n\n#i4000148# #b20#k #t4000148#
Don't the Master Death Teddys look sad? I mean, they're being controlled and confined by this ugly force.
Ahhh... Did you really gather up the #t4000148#s? Remember, I'll need 20 just to start the research on it. Let's see...
Perfect!! This should be a good indicator as to how this place has turned into what it has become, right? Phew, thanks!!
What? #t4000148# looks like this #i4000148:#. Are you sure you brought all 20 of them?
